amendment.description: To require a report on cooperation between the Department of Defense and the National Aeronautics and Space Administration on research, development, test, and evaluation activities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2506 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2506 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12595) To require a report on cooperation between the Department of Defense and the National Aeronautics and Space Administration on research, development, test, and evaluation activities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2506 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2506 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Hutchison.
